title: Newspaper Type
content: Could someone point out a few basic or appropriate typefaces for display type or bodycopy I could use for a newspaper cover/2-page spread assignment? Please help this lost design student.
author: oodko

comments.content:
a search on typophile returned the following results (for starters):

[Popular Newspaper Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020649/http:/typophile.com/node/8197)

[Favorite Newspaper Faces?](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020649/http:/typophile.com/node/11082)

[Body type for Magazine/Newspaper](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020649/http:/typophile.com/node/4963)

[Help for a new typophile on a newspaper redesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020649/http:/typophile.com/node/736)

These are just a few threads, a search will return several other threads you might want to check out. Hope this helps.
Thanks a lot! Sorry I don’t really know much about these forums yet.. So I’ll be sure to do some searches now when I’m in a fix.
